table.keys: Argument, HW Interface, HW Type, HW Usage

section.name: M_AXI Burst Information
section.HEADER_NOTE: Note: All burst requests might be further partitioned into multiple requests during RTL generation based on max_read_burst_length or max_write_burst_length settings.

Msg.msg_body: Since the only kind of statements allowed in a canonical dataflow region are variable declarations and function calls, the compiler may not be able to correctly handle the region
Only for/while/do support the pipeline pragma

There are a total of 6 such instances of non-canonical statements in the dataflow region
